question: I have been diagnosed with Small Vessel Disease this year.  I have type 2 diabetes which is under control as well as blood pressure.  I do not smoke.  I have a balance problem and have a weekness in my legs.  How much worse will this weekness get?  I do go for walks with a cane.  I do not want to end up in a wheelchair because my legs are too weak to walk.
title: Small Vessel Disease
